mapper.select: SELECT b.no no, title, content, image, lat, lng, user_no userNo, b.region_no regtionNo, packageable, b.regdate regdate, u.no 'user.no', u.nickname 'user.nickname' FROM board b LEFT JOIN package p ON b.no = place_no JOIN users u ON user_no = u.no WHERE b.no = #{no} OR p.no = #{no} ORDER BY `order`
